edge: Director Martin Scorsese was nominated for the Best Director award at the Academy Awards for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film).

Actor Leonardo DiCaprio was nominated for the Best Actor award at the Academy Awards and won the Best Actor – Motion Picture Musical or Comedy award at the Golden Globe Awards for his performance in The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film).
Actor Jonah Hill was nominated for the Best Supporting Actor award at the Academy Awards and Golden Globe Awards for his performance in The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film).

edge: The screenplay for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film), written by Terence Winter, was nominated for the Best Adapted Screenplay award at the Academy Awards.

The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film) was nominated for the Best Picture award at the Academy Awards.

Leonardo DiCaprio was nominated for the Best Actor award at the BAFTA Awards for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film).
The screenplay for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film), written by Terence Winter, was nominated for the Best Adapted Screenplay award at the BAFTA Awards.
